health.name: health
health.description: Health represents your current physical condition and stamina.

spirit.name: spirit
spirit.description: Spirit is your current mental state.

supply.name: supply
supply.description: Supply is an abstract representation of your preparedness, including ammo, food, water, and general upkeep.

conditions.name: conditions
conditions.description: As with all debilities, conditions impact your max momentum and momentum reset. In addition, if you are wounded, shaken, or unprepared, you cannot increase the associated track.

wounded.name: wounded
wounded.description: You are severely injured and need treatment to recover.

shaken.name: shaken
shaken.description: You are despairing or distraught, and need comfort to recover.

unprepared.name: unprepared
unprepared.description: You and your allies have exhausted their supplies, and must gather provisions in a community to recover.

encumbered.name: encumbered
encumbered.description: You are carrying excessive or cumbersome weight.

banes.name: banes
banes.description: Banes are permanent. They forever impact your character through the momentum penalty and—more importantly—through the narrative impact of being maimed or corrupted.

maimed.name: maimed
maimed.description: You have suffered a wound which causes you ongoing physical challenges, such as the loss of an eye or hand. Or, you bear horrific scars which serve as a constant reminder of your failures.

corrupted.name: corrupted
corrupted.description: Your experiences have left you emotionally scarred. You are at the threshold of losing yourself to darkness.

burdens.name: burdens
burdens.description: Burdens are a result of life-changing experiences that leave you bound to quests. Clearing a burden can only be accomplished by resolving the quest.

cursed.name: cursed
cursed.description: Cursed is marked when you [Face Death] and return with a soul-bound quest. This burden can only be cleared by completing the quest.

tormented.name: tormented
tormented.description: Tormented is marked when you [Face Desolation] and undertake a quest to prevent a dire future.

bonds.name: bonds
bonds.description: As you build relationships and complete quests in the service of others, you create bonds by making the Forge a Bond move

edge.name: edge
edge.description: Quickness, agility, and prowess in ranged combat.

heart.name: heart
heart.description: Courage, willpower, empathy, sociability, and loyalty.

iron.name: iron
iron.description: Physical strength, endurance, aggressiveness, and prowess in close combat.
